Container.Name: FTBOceanBlock
Container.Overview: FTB OceanBlock Modded Minecraft Server[br][br][b]FTB OceanBlock[/b][br]Time to dive in![br]Version tags available:[br] - latest[br] - 1.9.0[br] - 1.15.1[br] - 1.15.0[br] - 1.14.0[br] - 1.12.0[br] - 1.11.0[br] - 1.10.1[br][br][br]Setup:[br][li]You must accept the EULA by setting the [b]EULA[/b] variable to [span style='color: #00E800;']true[/span] or the install will fail.[br]Optional:[br][li]You can setup a comma separated list of players who will have admin privileges in game by setting [b]OPS[/b]

Config.Name: Installed Location
Config.Description: Path to store the installed server files.

Config.Name: EULA
Config.Description: Do you agree to the Mojang EULA available at https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula? Server will not start without accepting. Set to 'true' to accept.

Config.Name: OPS
Config.Description: Comma separated list of players to have op capability

Config.Name: LEVEL
Config.Description: Name of the world directory. It is usually world.
